# French Language Courses at Allopoto

Explore our course offerings:

## French for Beginners

-   Duration: 8 weeks
-   Learn basic vocabulary, grammar, and conversation skills.
-   Focused on everyday communication and simple structures.

## Intermediate French

-   Duration: 10 weeks
-   Deepen grammar and vocabulary.
-   Emphasis on listening, speaking, and real-world application.

## Advanced French

-   Duration: 12 weeks
-   Perfect for fluency and confidence.
-   Includes debate, essay writing, and cultural exploration.
